meanings.sent1: The paned door had small windows set into its sections.
meanings.sent2: The old house had paned windows that let in the sunlight.
meanings.sent3: The paned room divider made the space feel cozy and intimate.
meanings.sent4: Her heart felt paned, divided between joy and sorrow.
meanings.sent5: The paned glass reflected the colors of the sunset beautifully.

meanings.sent1: The paned cabinet doors showcased her collection of teacups.
meanings.sent2: The greenhouse had paned walls to allow plants to thrive.
meanings.sent3: He accidentally walked into the paned door, thinking it was open.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes looked out through the paned window, lost in thought.
meanings.sent5: The paned skylight illuminated the room with natural light.

meanings.definition: Divided into sections by vertical bars or strips
meanings.sent1: The paned fence separated the garden from the rest of the yard.
meanings.sent2: The paned screen had intricate designs dividing the panels.
meanings.sent3: The paned wall gave the illusion of more space in the room.
meanings.sent4: His mind felt paned, with thoughts compartmentalized and organized.
meanings.sent5: The paned gate creaked as it swung open, revealing the path ahead.
